title: I have a google pixel 3 xl after updating to android 11 i keep getting system isnt responding
content: I keep getting system ui isn't responding, cant turn on wifi nor Bluetooth , i have to do a reset several times after that it will work for like 2-3 days and then get back to the last issue please help oem unlock is grayed out cant reinstall software i even tried pixelrepairtool and i gor an error on rescue mode please help
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
